description: SUIT continues PDAC development, adding the WISE data, further exercising the DAX dbserv and imgserv APIs, and taking advantage of metaserv once it becomes available

Validate the data products with the LSST stack match or improve upon HSC products.  Validate the ops platform in NCSA, including installing the stack, starting & stopping production. Generate a validation data set for weekly integration and other tests.

column4: Validate the alert generation stack performance on several DECam & HSC datasets.

description: The production Aux Tel data acquisition hardware should be available in Tucson. We will prepare by testing the adjacent archive systems.
The production Aux Tel data acquisition hardware should be available in Tucson. We will demonstrate integration with the adjacent archive systems.
Validate alert distribution system and mini-broker fed by live or simulated live data.

Test the operation of the DM system prior to ComCam availability in Tucson. Note the LSE-79 requirements for DM services in support of ComCam in table 8. They're required by Nov 2019/Feb 2020; it may be more appropriate to test some of them at a later date?"
Partial camera data should be available to DM July 31st. We plan to test DM stack with it.
Demonstrate that we can acquire (and process?) data from the Spectrograph.
Test how the system will run during commissioning.
There is a project Milestone that DAQ/DM/Networks are available March 15th. We need to run tests in Feb to show this is ready.
ComCam will be in use in Nov. The DM system must be ready to deal with it.
More complete commissioning rehearsal: how do the scientists look at data? How do they provide feedback to the telescope? How do we create/update calibrations?
Dress rehearsal: commissioning starts in April
column4: so by this stage we should be ready to do everything needed.

description: ComCam data will now be available. Demonstrate its use in producing a data release.
Science Verification starts in April. Demonstrate that all required DM software is available.
Science Verification data will now be available. Demonstate its use in producting a data release.
